verbs.description: [ARG1: A malicious cyber campaign] [V: carried] out [ARG0: by the North Korean government] was detected by U.S. intelligence agencies on Thursday — just two days after the historic summit between President Trump and Kim Jong Un .

A malicious cyber campaign carried out by the North Korean government [V: was] detected by U.S. intelligence agencies on Thursday — just two days after the historic summit between President Trump and Kim Jong Un .

[ARG1: A malicious cyber campaign carried out by the North Korean government] was [V: detected] [ARG0: by U.S. intelligence agencies] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday — just two days after the historic summit between President Trump and Kim Jong Un] .
